descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>: Spiritway\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>\n(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)
storytext: Only the Koholasaurs — and some adults from the People of the Springs who have mastered a variety of different skills — are able to use the Spiritways with unfettered facility, swiftly traversing these pathways of constantly flowing phlogiston...
